titleStmt.title: The most excellent historie of Lysimachus and Varrona, daughter to Syllanus, Duke of Hypata, in Thessalia Wherin are contained the effects of fortune, the wonders of affection, and the conquests of incertaine time. By I.H. R.
titleStmt.author: Hind, John, fl. 1596-1606.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Hind. The dedication is signed: I.H.
Running title reads: The historie of Lysimachus and Varrona.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
